metadata.Title: CVE-2018-17095 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium
metadata.Description:
An issue has been discovered in mpruett Audio File Library (aka audiofile)0.3.6, 0.3.5, 0.3.4, 0.3.3, 0.3.2, 0.3.1, 0.3.0. A heap-based bufferoverflow in Expand3To4Module::run has occurred when running sfconvert.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-17095` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

audiofile-tools - 0.3.6-5build1
libaudiofile1 - 0.3.6-5build1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: audiofile package in esm-apps/focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.3.6-5build1').
